page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {LOCAL HISTORY - build the{railway}this meant they had more money to spend.On the 1st of July 1862 the first passenger{train steamed through Newcastleton{Railway Station.The men enjoyed their work as you can tell from many poems and stories.The closing of the{railway}in 1969 was a great disappointment to the people.The{Railway}brought food, coal, goods and people.You could go to Edinburgh in a hour and a half.All the secondary children from Newcastleton went by rail to Hawick.Since the {railway}has gone{road transport}has taken over.
